TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MarshalAsAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class MarshalAsAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class MarshalAsAttribute sealed : Attribute
.class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit MarshalAsAttribute extends System.Attribute

summary.span: 指示如何在托管代码与非托管代码之间封送数据。

span.span: Indicates how to marshal the data between managed and unmanaged code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以将此特性应用于参数、字段或返回值。You can apply this attribute to parameters, fields, or return values. 此属性是可选的，因为每个数据类型都有默认的封送处理行为。This attribute is optional, as each data type has a default marshaling behavior. 仅当给定类型可以封送到多种类型时，此属性才是必需的。This attribute is only necessary when a given type can be marshaled to multiple types. 例如，你可以将字符串封送为非托管代码，如作为 、、 或 。For example, you can marshal a string to unmanaged code as either a , a , a , or a . 默认情况下，公共语言运行时将字符串参数作为 封送为 COM 方法。By default, the common language runtime marshals a string parameter as a to COM methods. 您可以将 特性应用于单个字段或参数, 以使该特定字符串作为 而不是 封送。You can apply the attribute to an individual field or parameter to cause that particular string to be marshaled as a instead of a . [Tlbexp.exe （类型库导出程序）](/dotnet/framework/tools/tlbexp-exe-type-library-exporter)将封送首选项传递到公共语言运行时。The [Tlbexp.exe (Type Library Exporter)](/dotnet/framework/tools/tlbexp-exe-type-library-exporter) passes your marshaling preferences to the common language runtime. 与 COM 互操作或平台调用一起使用时，某些参数和返回值具有不同的默认封送处理行为。Some parameters and return values have different default marshaling behavior when used with COM interop or platform invoke. 默认情况下，运行时将字符串参数（和值类型中的字段）封送为平台调用方法或函数的 。By default, the runtime marshals a string parameter (and fields in a value type) as a to a platform invoke method or function. 有关其他信息，请参阅[默认封送行为](/dotnet/framework/interop/default-marshaling-behavior)。For additional information, see [Default Marshaling Behavior](/dotnet/framework/interop/default-marshaling-behavior). 在大多数情况下，属性只使用 枚举标识非托管数据的格式，如以下C#签名所示：In most cases, the attribute simply identifies the format of the unmanaged data using the enumeration, as shown in the following C# signature: [!code-csharp[system.runtime.interopservices.MarshalAsAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.MarshalAsAttribute/cs/Signature1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[system.runtime.interopservices.MarshalAsAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.MarshalAsAttribute/vb/Signature1.vb#2)] 某些 枚举成员需要额外的信息。Some enumeration members require additional information. 例如， 时需要其他信息。For example, additional information is needed when the is . 有关如何将此属性与数组一起使用的完整说明，请参阅[数组的默认封送处理](/dotnet/framework/interop/default-marshaling-for-arrays)。For a complete description of how to use this attribute with arrays, see [Default Marshaling for Arrays](/dotnet/framework/interop/default-marshaling-for-arrays). [Tlbimp.exe （类型库导入程序）](/dotnet/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer)还将此特性应用于参数、字段和返回值，以指示输入类型库中的数据类型不是对应的托管数据类型的默认类型。The [Tlbimp.exe (Type Library Importer)](/dotnet/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer) also applies this attribute to parameters, fields, and return values to indicate that the data type in the input type library is not the default type for the corresponding managed data type. 无论在输入类型库中指定何种类型，tlbimp.exe 始终会将 应用到 和 类型。Tlbimp.exe always applies the to and types for clarity, regardless of the type specified in the input type library. > [!NOTE] > 不支持对泛型类型进行封送处理。The does not support marshaling of generic types. ## Examples 下面的示例将 应用于托管类型中的字段、方法参数和方法返回值。The following example applies the to a field, a method parameter, and a method return value in a managed type. [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.MarshalAsAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.MarshalAsAttribute/cs/marshalasattribute.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.InteropServices.MarshalAsAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.MarshalAsAttribute/vb/marshalasattribute.vb#1)] 下面的示例将 特性应用于属性：The following example applies the attribute to a property: [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.MarshalAsAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.MarshalAsAttribute/cs/Signature1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.InteropServices.MarshalAsAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.MarshalAsAttribute/vb/Signature1.vb#3)]

span.span: Type Library Exporter (Tlbexp.exe)
Type Library Importer (Tlbimp.exe)

summary.span: 使用指定的 值初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数采用表示每个 枚举成员的基础16位有符号整数。This constructor takes an underlying 16-bit signed integer that represents each enumeration member. [Tlbimp.exe （类型库导入程序）](/dotnet/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer)使用此构造函数。The [Tlbimp.exe (Type Library Importer)](/dotnet/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer) uses this constructor.

summary.span: 使用指定的 枚举成员初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified enumeration member.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于不容易出错的可读代码，请始终使用此构造函数。For readable code that is less prone to error, always use this constructor.

summary.span: 指定非托管 或 的元素类型。

span.span: Specifies the element type of the unmanaged or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以将此参数设置为 枚举中的一个值，以指定数组元素的类型。You can set this parameter to a value from the enumeration to specify the type of the array's elements. 如果未指定类型，则使用与托管数组的元素类型相对应的默认非托管类型。If a type is not specified, the default unmanaged type corresponding to the managed array's element type is used. 例如，COM 中 `LPWStr` 数组的 `ArraySubType` 。For example, the `ArraySubType` for a `LPWStr` array in COM is . 有关其他信息，请参阅[数组的默认封送处理](/dotnet/framework/interop/default-marshaling-for-arrays)。For additional information, see [Default Marshaling for Arrays](/dotnet/framework/interop/default-marshaling-for-arrays).

summary.span: 指定 COM 使用的非托管 特性的参数索引。

span.span: Specifies the parameter index of the unmanaged attribute used by COM.

summary.span: 向自定义封送处理程序提供附加信息。

span.span: Provides additional information to a custom marshaler.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用自定义封送拆收器时，此字段是可选的。This field is optional when using a custom marshaler. 您可以将此字段设置为向自定义封送拆收器提供附加信息的字符串。You can set this field to a string that supplies additional information to a custom marshaler. 例如，可以使用相同的封送拆收器来提供多个包装，其中，cookie 用于指示特定包装。For example, the same marshaler can be used to provide a number of wrappers, where the cookie is used to indicate the specific wrapper.

summary.span: 指定自定义封送处理程序的完全限定名。

span.span: Specifies the fully qualified name of a custom marshaler.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 或 字段为属性化参数、字段或返回类型指定自定义封送拆收器类型。You can use either the or field specify a custom marshaler type for the attributed parameter, field, or return type. 使用 "" 字段可以指定表示自定义封送拆收器的完全限定名称的字符串。The field enables you to specify a string representing the fully qualified name of a custom marshaler. 它对于后期绑定引用非常有用，但它比用于指定自定义封送拆收器的 更少。It is useful for late-bound references, but is less preferred than for specifying a custom marshaler. 有关创建和使用自定义封送拆收器的其他信息，请参阅[自定义封送](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/49f9ac47-1619-4d6e-9da6-bf06bba12079)。For additional information about creating and using custom marshalers, see [Custom Marshaling](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/49f9ac47-1619-4d6e-9da6-bf06bba12079).

span.span: Implements as a type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 "" 或 "" 字段为属性化参数、字段或返回类型指定自定义封送处理程序类型。You can use either the or field to specify a custom marshaler type for the attributed parameter, field, or return type. 通过缩短语法，"" 字段允许更轻松地使用 。The field allows easier usage of by shortening the syntax. 在下面的示例中，第一行表示使用 的语法，第二行表示使用 的语法。In the following example, the first line represents syntax using and the second line represents syntax using . ``` [MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.CustomMarshaler, MarshalType = "Assembly, NameSpace.TypeName")] ``` ``` [MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.CustomMarshaler, MarshalTypeRef = typeof(NameSpace.TypeName)] ``` 您可以使用中的 `typeof` 设置 对象C#，`GetType` 在中 Visual Basic 或 `typeid` C++。You can set a object using `typeof` in C#, `GetType` in Visual Basic, or `typeid` in C++. 有关创建和使用自定义封送拆收器的其他信息，请参阅[自定义封送](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/49f9ac47-1619-4d6e-9da6-bf06bba12079)。For additional information about creating and using custom marshalers, see [Custom Marshaling](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/49f9ac47-1619-4d6e-9da6-bf06bba12079).

span.span: Indicates the element type of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以将此字段设置为 枚举中的一个值，以指定安全数组的元素的类型。You can set this field to a value from the enumeration to specify the type of the safe array's elements. 如果未指定类型，则使用托管元素类型的默认类型（如果传递为变体）。If a type is not specified, the managed element type's default type (if passed as a VARIANT) is used. 例如，COM 中 `int` 数组的 `SafeArraySubType` 。For example, the `SafeArraySubType` for an `int` array in COM is . 有关其他信息，请参阅[数组的默认封送处理](/dotnet/framework/interop/default-marshaling-for-arrays)。For additional information, see [Default Marshaling for Arrays](/dotnet/framework/interop/default-marshaling-for-arrays).

summary.span: 指示用户定义的 元素类型。

span.span: Indicates the user-defined element type of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用自定义类型初始化此字段，使 `SAFEARRAY` 的元素能够成功封送。Initialize this field with your custom type to enable the elements of the `SAFEARRAY` to be marshaled successfully. 仅当 为 、或 时，才需要此字段。This field is only needed when the is either , , or . 有关其他信息，请参阅[数组的默认封送处理](/dotnet/framework/interop/default-marshaling-for-arrays)。For additional information, see [Default Marshaling for Arrays](/dotnet/framework/interop/default-marshaling-for-arrays).

summary.span: 指示固定长度数组中的元素数，或要导入的字符串中的字符（不是字节）数。

span.span: Indicates the number of elements in the fixed-length array or the number of characters (not bytes) in a string to import.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此字段对于 枚举的 和 成员是必需的。This field is required for the and members of the enumeration. 由于元数据的压缩格式限制为0x1FFFFFFF，因此 的允许值的范围为（> = 0，< = 0x1FFFFFFF）。Because the compressed format of the metadata is limited to 0x1FFFFFFF, the range of allowed values for are (>= 0 and <= 0x1FFFFFFF). 有关其他信息，请参阅[数组的默认封送处理](/dotnet/framework/interop/default-marshaling-for-arrays)。For additional information, see [Default Marshaling for Arrays](/dotnet/framework/interop/default-marshaling-for-arrays).

summary.span: 指示从零开始的参数，该参数包含数组元素的计数，与 COM 中的 类似。

span.span: Indicates the zero-based parameter that contains the count of array elements, similar to in COM.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字段支持托管到非托管和非托管的调用。The field supports managed-to-unmanaged and unmanaged-to-managed calls. 它不会对调用 COM 对象的托管代码产生任何影响。It does not have any effect on managed code that calls COM objects. 根据托管类型和应用于该类型的属性，可以将数组作为安全数组或 C 样式数组传递。Depending on the managed type and the attributes applied to it, the array can be passed as a safe array or C-style array. 当数组作为 C 样式数组传递时，封送拆收器无法确定数组的大小。When arrays are passed as C-style arrays, the marshaler cannot determine the size of the array. 因此，若要将托管数组传递到非托管函数或方法，必须提供两个参数：Therefore, to pass an managed array to an unmanaged function or method, you must provide two arguments: - 由引用或值定义的数组。The array, defined by reference or value. - 按引用或值定义的数组大小。The array size, defined by reference or value. 数组大小参数的从零开始的索引是使用 字段定义的。The zero-based index of the array size parameter is defined by using the field. 如果同时指定 字段的 和 ，则字段值的总和将产生大小总计。If you specify both and with a field, the sum of the fields' values produces a size total. 有关详细信息，请参阅[数组的默认封送处理](/dotnet/framework/interop/default-marshaling-for-arrays)。For more information, see [Default Marshaling for Arrays](/dotnet/framework/interop/default-marshaling-for-arrays). ## Examples [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.MarshalAsAttribute.SizeParamIndex#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Runtime.InteropServices.MarshalAsAttribute.SizeParamIndex/CPP/marshalas.sizeparamindex.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.MarshalAsAttribute.SizeParamIndex#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Runtime.InteropServices.MarshalAsAttribute.SizeParamIndex/CS/marshalas.sizeparamindex.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.InteropServices.MarshalAsAttribute.SizeParamIndex#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Runtime.InteropServices.MarshalAsAttribute.SizeParamIndex/VB/marshalas.sizeparamindex.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Value As UnmanagedType

summary.span: 获取 值，数据将被作为该值封送。

span.span: Gets the value the data is to be marshaled as.

value.span: 值，数据将被作为该值封送。

span.span: The value the data is to be marshaled as.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此值与 一起使用，以指示应如何在托管代码和非托管代码之间封送类型。This value is used with to indicate how types should be marshaled between managed and unmanaged code. 在某些情况下，可以将此字段与某些 `UnmanagedType` 枚举成员一起使用。In some cases, you can use this field with certain `UnmanagedType` enumeration members. 对于 和 ，必须使用其他命名参数。For and , you must use additional named parameters.
